title: Egg fried peanut rice
description: Adding a handful of salted peanuts to this easy egg fried rice recipe will completely change the game. Give it a go for a quick midweek dinner in just 20 minutes.
ingredients: 2 tbsp light soy sauce, plus extra to serve

method.Step 1: Mix the eggs, chilli and seasoning. Heat half the oil in a wok or large frying pan over a medium heat. Add the egg and cook like a pancake, until set and pale golden. Slide out, roll up and finely shred. Set aside.

method.Step 2: Add the remaining oil and peanuts to the wok and stir-fry for 2 minutes. Add the spring onions, cook for 1 minute, then add the cooked rice, peas and soy sauce. Stir-fry until the rice is hot. Serve topped with the egg and extra soy sauce to drizzle over.
